mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.data1 AS "data1", a.data2 AS "data2", a.cover AS "cover", a.course_level AS "courseLevel"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homework( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, type, data1, data2, cover, course_level ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{type}, #{data1}, #{data2}, #{cover}, #{courseLevel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE homework SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, data1 = #{data1}, data2 = #{data2}, cover = #{cover}, course_level = #{courseLevel} WHERE id = #{id}
